column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A video from Boeung Chhouk
column5: appears to show a cock fighting ring.------The unknown owner of the site seems to have no issue in flouting the law
column6: being fairly open by holding such illegal matches in broad daylight and well within the capital city limits.------There is speculation that the site operator must have friends in high places in order to continue the matches with impunity.------The video was sent to the district governor and inspector of Meanchey police force. ------https://kbn.news/archives/122730
